hero.title: Welcome to Afdal
hero.subtitle: Optimized solutions for real-world complexity. We specialize in generating sets of optimized solutions, not just one.

header.title: Who we are
header.subtitle: Researchers & engineers passionate about Operations Research.

body.title: Our Mission
body.paragraph: At Afdal, we are a team of researcher-engineers with 10+ years of experience. We believe Operations Research is underused, and we specialize in providing iterators of optimized solutions instead of just a single one.

header.title: Our Solution
header.subtitle: Practical tools for efficient routing and logistics.

body.title: Afdal Route
body.paragraph: Afdal Route is our production-ready solution. It provides optimized routing with multiple alternatives, ensuring flexibility and robustness in real-world logistics.

header.title: Contact us
header.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions.

header.title: مرحبًا بك في أفضل
header.subtitle: حلول مُحسّنة لمواجهة التحديات المعقدة في العالم الحقيقي.
